about_the_game:
Welcome to JOB!

Do you have what it takes to increase Shareholder Value 📈?

Are you obsessed with Customer Satisfaction 💁🏻?

Can you lift things 📦?

Apply Now and climb to the top of the Company Scoreboard!

Remember: Company Loves You!



Fulfillment is a short, social-commentary game about working at a fulfillment center. Each day you will tackle an increasingly complex set of rules and restrictions, trying to make enough to afford rent and basic necessities. It's meant to be a small, bite-size taste of the full experience in this line of work - a single playthough takes only about 20 minutes (provided you make it all the way to the end).

The game is and will always be 100% free without any micro-transaction!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.4 / 17 , Fedora Linux (version 26) x86_64, Archlinux x86_64, Mint 18.2, Archlinux x86_64
  • Processor: Intel Duo 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: fcSceneSocialLinks

name: FULFILLMENT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Duo 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Preferably

short_description: Exciting Adventure About the Joys of Working at an Amazin' Fulfillment Center! Short, social commentary game that is 100% free, no micro-transactions.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Italian*
*languages with full audio support
